B089C314_190402A6_SDBB2.summary: In this reality TV episode, the two main characters, Mike and his partner, embark on a scavenging adventure inside a house brimming with historical charm. They focused on extracting valuable items like a stained glass door and vintage trim work, while also appreciating the architectural beauty of the house. Their task became more than just work as they exchanged light-hearted banter and reflected on their college experiences. With plans to return for more treasures, particularly for the exterior features like the moose sign and the roof, they wrap up their day, satisfied with their accomplishments.
